body: The budget here is **1 hour**, which is exactly how much time will be paid for when the task is completed

what IDE are you using? I'm using Eclipse. I cloned the repository to my computer and when I try to import the project from the git repository it says "No projects found", so I guess it's not an Eclipse project.
I'm using IntelliJ IDEA. But in Eclipse it should work just fine. It's a Maven project.
I pretty finished this, ran a build and everything is ok, but I cannot make a push, it says that permission is denied. any ideas?
You should fork first, see http://www.tpc2.com/dev/git
I created a pull request for this, hope everything's ok :)

issue.title: #20 Added remove() method to Gists

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
Added remove(String name) method to Gists to delete a gist by name, plus
unit and integration testing.
